column4: greetings, I've never used ubuntu. Can someone tell me when 9.04 came out or when a neww version is due? i want to know if I should start with te current or wait for the new release.
thanks. I've been using suse for years now but I just discovered ebox and its ubuntu based so I'm forced to get into ubuntu now also.
ubuntu x.y = year 2, month y release
